title: Fizz is busted and there is no change to fix that
body: How in the world a champion that can one shot with a skill can get so much free mobility and a short cd zhonya on top of zhonya is beyond my imagination, I'm to a point I have to consider permabanning that busted champion.

replies.body: have you tried building mr such as banshee's veil?

> [{quoted}](name=VICKLIUS,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=6ZYXRrQu,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-03-13T00:30:25.641+0000)
>
> have you tried building mr such as banshee's veil?

Honestly I hate this argument, because even when you build banshees, you can die to a 60 cs Fizz thats 1/3/0 from 90% health. I don't feel like you should** virtually ever** have to build defensively when you won laning phase heavily, and still get nearly/fully 100%'d. That is just poor balancing. Just something needs to happen about his E IMO, thats where a lot of his problem lies. Tons of mobility, invulnerability/AoE damage, in combination to his short dash... its AP fiora if you will.
Ban him, then. He wont get nerfed just because you cant handle him.
Dodge the fish, fight him when his E is on cooldown.

Fizz has a bunny skin for a reason, hes good at snowballing against vegetables.

All toxicity aside, I want fizz to be strong, i want him to be the most powerful thing that hit summoners rift, I want him to make every squishy on the enemy team want to dodge.. 

Because fizz is just another champion that I can pick tahm support into and still be useful while my team tilts me by flaming me for not being able to peel for everyone at once thinking i can solo tank without any other frontline on the team.

But i saved you from that fizz ult, flame me all you want because you decided to go back in while i laugh and spam ping that my w is on cooldown
